translations: v．（马蹄）咔嚓声，蹄声：指马蹄在硬地面上行走时发出的声音。
· I could hear the clopping of horse hooves in the distance.
我能听到远处马蹄的咔嚓声。

sentences.sentence: There was the wonder I felt when I saw a brace of mountain like, spotted, black-and-white horses clopping down a dusty road through clouds of powdered clay.
sentences.translation: 当我看到一对山，就像黑白斑点的马，踏着尘土飞扬的道路，穿过尘土飞扬的粘土时，我感到了一种奇妙的感觉。

sentences.sentence: The outside world may see an unvarying kingdom of royal weddings, golden carriages and clip-clopping Horse Guards, with a young prime minister drawn from the old Establishment.
sentences.translation: 在国外人看来这个王国并无变化：皇室婚礼、黄金马车、马蹄得得的皇家骑卫队以及正当权的年轻首相。
